WorkItem.Description: How to Creatre An ASP.NET Webapplication through which we can Do Payments With PayPal..

Comments.Message:
Hello dLcreations and jrajapandian,

Thank you for using our code sample request service. 

I'd like to confirm with you my understanding of the sample request:

Your sample idea is simple solution looks like Alibaba.com. But I think it should contact with bank system and  cooperate with them. So this sample idea can not be composed by ourself. It is because that this project is Microsoft's project. Base on that our team should compose sample using Microsoft's technology. Although Microsoft doesn't provide support for third party software or interface. I can give you to another site that can assist you. Please access to http://www.sourcecodesworld.com/scripts/PayPal-614/. Thank again for your sample idea.



Sincerely
All-In-One Code Framework
http://1code.codeplex.com
